# nbdev_cards

<!-- WARNING: THIS FILE WAS AUTOGENERATED! DO NOT EDIT! -->

## Install

``` sh
pip install nbdev_cards
```

## How to use

The lib
[`Card`](https://genughaben.github.io/nbdev_cards/card.html#card) helps
to create and compare playing cards

``` python
Card(1,2)
```

    ♠️2

``` python
Card(1,2) < Card(1,1)
```

    False
